author: Kelly Whitlam
comment: Tube guides brilliant 10/10. My issues with it were, id plan a journey (kings x to adelphi say) it gave me tube lines,direction,stops etc... but.. when i exit the tube it doesnt the tell me on the walk to bit, which direction to walk and i ended up the wrong way :-( was hoping it would be a bit more sat nav style for the actual walking app.

author: 福Power Justice
comment: Amazing App! Last weekendI was in Berlin for the first time and this app really helped me with the different kinds of transportations and finding the places I wanted to go to! Saved me from potentially getting lost... XD I really can recommend this app to get around (in bigger cities)!

author: Volker Jacob
comment: Amazing. Sent from heaven... 😂 This app should be a must for any city tourism department to push to their visitors! I have been in Lisbon now for three months - and managed my way around the public transport with the weirdest and worst tools imaginable! This app solved all my problems and brings lots od unexpected extras - love it! The only complaint i have is that it took me so long to find it... 😂

author: eveline pezzini
comment: [edit] It could use a button for "I've arrived". Many times I have to close the app without the ticket because it won't accept that I have already arrived.   Very good app to help with public transport (better than the one my city provides lol).

author: Sasha.M
comment: You're beginning to complicate too much. Don't forget what is primary purpose of your app. Keep simple.

author: Saikat Saha
comment: This application is all you need to get around in a big city. Highly recommended! Though I'd suggest complementing it with Google maps when walking on foot based on my experience. But if you want to get from point A to B, this is definitely the app

author: Rajesh Nandha
comment: App is ok. I don't need to leave location on constantly and I contacted the makers of the app twice to ask how to get rid of the reminder at the bottom of the screen, no response so lost a couple of stars.

author: Tom Stembridge
comment: By far the most useful app I have used in any city. If you live or are travelling to one of its supported cities. This is the only app you'll need to get yourself about. Good job developers excited to see what you'll do next

author: Dallas Cheung
comment: Worked great in Hong Kong when I visited.  Must have if you are using transit there.

author: Andrei Florin Ivan
comment: Tells me all trains are leaving on time while in truth all are cancelled. Slow updates, not worth it.

author: Amit Basu
comment: Just about the best, most comprehensive, app of this nature I have come across so far. Highly recommended.

author: Walter W.
comment: I don't want to take Uber, but there is no option to disable Uber as part of the transportation

author: Tony Varghese
comment: Love the get off alerts and notification status of transit mode just at the time when it's needed.

author: Jonathan Ventura
comment: Very informative and accurate. The colors and design are also great. Highly recommend for city-dwellers and travelers.

author: Oliver Chessler
comment: grea

author: Nilesh B
comment: Superb app, can't live without it

reply.author: Citymapper Limited
reply.content: Hi Nilesh, thanks for the message. In general we have quite sophisticated systems in place that are smart around battery consumption, e.g. only ask for location when absolutely necessary. At which moment did you notice the battery issue, were you on GO? Could you send more details to support@citymapper.com to have a closer look? Appreciated! thx

author: Ceren Turan
comment: Great app!

author: Jaipal Dhiman
comment: Your app is perfect, except for one thing! I can see that the app runs in the background pinging for my location constantly. Why is this? I don't use the notification functionality, I haven't set any lines to be notified about. This app shouldn't run in the background as much as the Google app on my phone, the location should only be required when using the app. Sometimes I haven't used your app all day yet it will have around 300 wakelocks by the end of the day. Otherwise, great app guys. Please update and I'll give you 5 stars.

author: Dave Kaleel
comment: By far the best app for public transportation I've used. I moved to Chicago and had no idea what to do and where to go. Citymapper changed that. I would commute 1-2 hours a day one way and this app was accurate down to the minute, even incorporating delays in real time. And living in Europe now, I can use this in major cities I frequent too.

author: Larry Cottingham
comment: I used this app on my vacation in Seoul late last year and I absolutely loved it. It helped me navigate public transportation and got us to our destination easily. I couldn't be happier with it, except the need to add more cities!

author: Sabrina Somalo Bonini
comment: Why is the new update not showing the minutes for the specific transport to arrive and only showing the times, which, BTW, are not accurate!!?! This was the best feature and most useful for me and it's now gone. WHY?!!! Now I have to calculate the time it will arrive and when I'm at the stop it doesn't arrive at the time it said!! It's useless now.

author: Chris Mitchell
comment: Absolutely fantastic at telling you the best way to get around. Only downside is being offered the opportunity to collect Citymapper receipts which I cannot see the point/benefit of.

J'adore cette Application , elle remplace celle de la RATP avec succès ! L'application est beaucoup plus ergonomique , compactible avec les dernières nouveautés d'Android Oreo . Bref , c'est parfait :) Optimisé , Rapide et ergonomique .

author: Szymon Nowicki
comment: I don't know what would I do without this app, especially in a city of Manchester, where bus companies seem not to care about the schedule.

author: Jessica O'Neal
comment: Anyone who gives this app less than 5 stars has no brain. This app is amazing. Far better than Google maps and any other nyc transit app I've tried. Kudos!
Beats all other city transport apps hands down.

author: Richie Russell
comment: I can vouch that this app is amazing for getting around in London!

author: Daniel Stanley
comment: Used it for years now, constantly improving. Probably the best app I've ever installed, I'd be lost without it.

author: Margie
comment: My first trip to NYC and I navigated the public transit like a seasoned veteran. I loved this app.  I felt so in control.

author: Prathamesh Puralkar
comment: This is a very reliable app. Timings are really accurate so you can plan your journey accordingly.

author: Michael Griffin
comment: Used this app in London (UK) and was able to get around town quickly and with confidence. Highly recommended.

author: Richard Morris
comment: Didn't have the school bus route I was after - despite supposedly having school bus support, so the app is pointless, for me.

author: Michael Loizou
comment: Must have commuting app. Bring it to more cities in Europe. Thank you!!!!

author: Sean Conroy
comment: Brilliant app for all your transport needs

author: Bogdan Maxim
comment: Best User experience I have seen in any app. Just great.

author: Rafael Carmo
comment: Best app of the category, it has absolutely everything for São Paulo

author: Shashank Rathi
comment: So much better than google maps for commute in London!!

author: Arash Outadi
comment: Awesome map app but no voice navigation unfortunately

author: Katherine Lopez
comment: I love it as it gets me on time everywhere.
Works great,
